description:
Kogoro, Conan, and Ran go to Hoto Temple to solve the mystery of a strange Buddha. The eleven-faced Kannon sometimes turns to face the side or turns its back on its own, and something bad always happens when it does. The Buddha is facing backwards on this day as well, and head priest Fukuhara`s wife and daugher worry that something bad will happen again. Later, Conan and his friends witness the priest and his son arguing. That night, as predicted by the Buddha, the priest is murdered in the temple...
Source: crunchyroll
